ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 568
ygData.msgSnippet: Whew.  Such a deal! On Fennin Ro the Golden Black Pearl Choker routinely sells for 700pp. BTW, I got a black pearl from Choon and Froon in West Karanas.  That
ygData.messageBody:
Whew. Such a deal!

On Fennin Ro the Golden Black Pearl Choker routinely sells for 700pp.

BTW, I got a black pearl from Choon and Froon in West Karanas. That I
*never* expected.

Crier Sharpsong - 37th song bard on Fennin Ro


> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > PS - You Innoruuk Bards with the Platinum Ruby Veils and the
> Golden Black
> > Pearl Chokers (you know who you are, Sylly and Harmonic) - who makes
> > them? How much should I expect to pay? Where do I go to find a Black
> > Pearl?
>
> Nadare, Smith, Circe.
>
> Veil runs around 1k pp.
> Choker runs around 300 pp.
>
> Black pearls seem to drop from aviak avocets most frequently.
> However I have got them from griffons and hill giants on the
> most rare occassion.
>
> Harmonic.
